home.title: My Nextjs / Typescript / Sanity.io project
home.description: I'm a multi-disciplinary designer with a focus on Digital/interactive Design, identities, and a dabbler of ttrpg maps. I love diving into the world of colors, shapes, and typography to bring ideas to life, capturing their attention and leaving a lasting impression.
